short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy subtitles translator for Netflix and YouTube

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pigenius is an extension allowing to easily translate English subtitles into Czech without interrupting the video. 

Just open your favourite film on Netflix or choose the video on YouTube, turn on English subtitles, turn on the Pigenius extension and see the translation of English word just by clicking on it in the subtitles. 

Not only will you find the best matching translation to Czech, but also clear definition on English. 

Itâ€™s as easy as it sounds, allowing you to learn new words and improving your English skills while having fun watching your favourite shows.
